analysis.description:
Gateway.payToken (/unique_chucks/13/0x1e29ca8c874b4dff828297cc2e9856819eea0933.sol#367-378) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(msg.sender,feeAccountToken,_value.mul(feePercent).div(100000000)) (/unique_chucks/13/0x1e29ca8c874b4dff828297cc2e9856819eea0933.sol#372-373)
	-token.transferFrom(msg.sender,_sellerAddress,_value.sub(_value.mul(feePercent).div(100000000))) (/unique_chucks/13/0x1e29ca8c874b4dff828297cc2e9856819eea0933.sol#373-376)

Reentrancy in Gateway.payToken (/unique_chucks/13/0x1e29ca8c874b4dff828297cc2e9856819eea0933.sol#367-378):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(token.allowance(msg.sender,this) >= _value) (/unique_chucks/13/0x1e29ca8c874b4dff828297cc2e9856819eea0933.sol#370-372)
	- token.transferFrom(msg.sender,feeAccountToken,_value.mul(feePercent).div(100000000)) (/unique_chucks/13/0x1e29ca8c874b4dff828297cc2e9856819eea0933.sol#372-373)
	- token.transferFrom(msg.sender,_sellerAddress,_value.sub(_value.mul(feePercent).div(100000000))) (/unique_chucks/13/0x1e29ca8c874b4dff828297cc2e9856819eea0933.sol#373-376)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- payment (/unique_chucks/13/0x1e29ca8c874b4dff828297cc2e9856819eea0933.sol#376-378)
